data.description: IT Integration and Analytics Summer Intern – 2026 Tri-State is an electric power utility providing electricity to rural electric cooperatives. We have an IT Integration and Analytics Summer Intern opportunity for 2026. Students who have successfully completed three (3) or more years of undergraduate study towards a degree in Business Analytics, Data Science, or similar from an accredited college or university are encouraged to apply. Seniors who will be graduating in December or are planning to or already attending graduate school in the Fall are also encouraged to apply. This summer position offers students hands on opportunity to support the development of Tri-State’s data warehouse and centralized reporting solution. This will include communicating with business users, acquiring and defining business requirements, developing custom data views, and generating dashboards/reports for use by the business. This position will be working directly with IT’s Integration and Analytics ...
